mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectMbrOnlnePch Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ ORD_NO , MBR_NO , ORD_DT , RTL_PRC_SUM_AMT , SALE_SUM_AMT , PAY_SUM_AMT , CLM_SUM_AMT , REG_DT FROM MBR_ONLNE_PCH WHERE 1 = 1 AND ORD_NO = #{ordNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteMbrOnlnePch Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ FROM MBR_ONLNE_PCH WHERE 1 = 1 AND ORD_NO = #{ordNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
